page.title: 040ne Day in l985 (Cont).
page.content: winning, our teacher supports them and he likes them to win especially if my team loses. After half time the whistle went and we started to play, as the game went on I thought that Tottenham would lose, but they scored and I stood up and cheered like mad with the rest of the fans it was a really exiting feeling to be there with all those people cheering my one greatest team. By the last five minutes Tottenham had given away a penalty so I thought it was going to be a draw but Wolves missed and the ball went over the bar much to my relief. Then the referee blew the whistle for the end of the match, I cheered and shouted for my team had won.This was one of the most exiting days in my life and the one I remember best of all. Jason Goodall age 11. July l985.
